name: Create User
description: Create a new user account and choose if it has admin access.

spec.question_description: Sets the username of the newly created account. Exclude the '@' and server name postfix. So to create @stevo:example.org just enter 'stevo'.
Sets the password of the newly created account.
Sets whether this user account will be a server admin. Server admins can use their access tokens to run administration/moderation commands on the homeserver.
